title: Basics of Animal Care and Psychology
headline: This free online course explores animal psychology and behaviour to help you provide better pet and animal care.
description: Every animal has its own care guidelines and needs. This animal psychology course thus provides an overview of various approaches to animal care that promote their health and wellbeing. We discuss effective ways to care for common pets, including horses, cats, dogs and even ornamental fish and reptiles. We explain how to assess the mental and physical health of animals to provide adequate care for them. Sign up to understand animal behaviour.
courseDescription:
There are about seven million species of animals in the world. Each species has a different set of care needs. This animal psychology course lays out the guidelines used to provide proper care to common pets and animals that protects their physical and mental health. This course is carefully curated by a team of experienced professionals from the Study Hub. Study Hub is a leading education provider and believes in promoting student-driven teaching and learning that encompasses engagement and practice.

The course begins with a definition of ‘animal welfare’. We show you that ‘welfare’ does not just include food but also encompasses psychological wellbeing, hygiene, proper nutrition and the animal’s environment. We also discuss the origins and domestic histories of various common animals that live in our homes and farms. We use real-world examples to demonstrate how veterinary professionals use various behavioural, physical and physiological indicators to assess an animal’s health. The course explains how to monitor such indicators to keep track of the physical and mental health of animals in your care.

We then teach you various first-aid techniques used to treat animals in emergency situations. The course focuses on common pets like cats, dogs, horses and birds to prepare you for dangerous domestic situations. We then teach you how to provide animal care to rabbits, guinea pigs, reptiles and ornamental fish. This course has no prerequisites and provides the knowledge and skills needed to assess your pet's health and care for it. It also suits anyone interested in a career related to animal care. Sign up to ensure the health and wellbeing of animals in your care.
